discussion.content: B) and C) are the same answer here.

Ans B is correct
Figure 1.1, page 11, COBIT 2019 Framework Introduction and Methodology

choices.B: Addressing the overall organization, strategy and supporting activities for IT

C. Assessing strategic options and guiding senior management on the options chosen

questions.question_text: The enterprise goal "Staff skills, motivation and productivity" is organized into which balanced scorecard (BSC) dimension?
Which of the following is MOST critical to ensuring the objective of managed availability and capacity?

choices.C: Identification of single points of failure
choices.A: Allocation of budgets for business continuity
choices.B: Future prediction of I&T resource requirements

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Future prediction of I&T resource requirements

B is correct Answer. 
Page 34 - BAI04 Purpose : "optimization of system performance through prediction of
future performance and capacity requirements"
B. according to page 34, BAI04, Managed availability and capacity, COBIT-2019 Framework Introduction and Methodology
A. Allocation of budgets for business continuity
